title: Chain Welder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a role from <#970046125065265202> that has the word “chain” in it, including flavor text.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will gain the abilities, attributes, and defense & attack value of the role you selected on top of your first ability
- You may multitask at night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: complete the goal of whatever role you have copied

desc:
Post 4997
_Don’t worry guys, I got it._
